Provide a variety of dial's size for the watch.
Five Stars
review:
Very nice watch

Awesome looking watch. If you have a wrist of 6inch or lower this is the only
Fastrack watch that will fit in your wrist. Anything over case diameter of
40mm will be too big for your watch. I got it for 1965 during the Indian
festival offer. I gave it 4stars instead of 5 because of the following
reasons.  
Cons.....  
1\. Case is too thick for my liking.  
2\. In silent places it will make clicking noise of the second hand.  
3\. Can be slightly uncomfortable because of the weight.

Decent Watch.  
Build Quality Great.  
Casual But if belt changed with Black will also be fine.  
It's Display (dial) is roughly 4cm.  
Overall Pretty Nice in this Price Range with Black Dial.  
It needs very little shine on it while seeing time.

just got it today...must say the design and elegance is top notch.Premium
design..Highly recommended for those who want to buy Fastrack watch.  
But i have given 4 star because i noticed that the warranty card is not signed
by the seller. I doubt if i get warranty with this .Else it is more that 5
star for me.Just loved it

Yes it's a good looking watch. But when i opened the package i found that in
the guarantee certificate they have mentioned that it should be signed,filled
and stamped by authorized dealers but in my card it was blank. So what does
this mean??i need some clarifications. Hope i'll get it

It's a very sober and an elegant watch to wear. Definitely stands out thanks
to the beige band and the smartly designed dial. However, it does come with
few flaws; the dial feels a tad bit bulky and large for someone with a not so
big wrist. It's difficult to see the time under dull lighting as the needle is
silver and blends in with the black dial. Having said that, I think this is
the best watch I've purchased off late and will definitely recommend it for
the price. Feels very premium and a niche product.

Product is not much good. I thought that it is light weighted with small dial.
If so it was excellent. It is weighted and dial is medium. It is Ok that's
all. Amazon's notable experience is their customer service. It is the best
service in online shopping, no doubt. I am appreciating them. Thank you

Product dial is good but belt is verry thin. The last portion of belt is verry
thin and other other portion is perfect size. And end of the belt there are so
many wrinkles😁product shining is not good👎

The watch is really great but the size isn't. There must be a variety of the
dial's size for different types of person because some are having a thick
wrist but some doesn't. Though I wanted a size larger than what I got still it
was satisfactory because if the colour and evrything else other than the size.
So I would recommend for providing different size.

Awesome watch
